title: India Yamaha Motor launches R3 and MT-03 as completely built units
description: Yamaha R3: India Yamaha Motor has introduced new sports bikes, R3 and MT-03, expanding its product range in the local market. The R3 focuses on the track, while the MT-03 is designed for street riding. Both are part of the 'The Call of the Blue' campaign and sold as 'completely built-up units' (CBUs).
